com.ibm.wiotp.sdk.devicemgmt

Class DeviceFirmware

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.wiotp.sdk.devicemgmt.resource.Resource
      • com.ibm.wiotp.sdk.devicemgmt.DeviceFirmware

  • public class DeviceFirmware
extends Resource
    Device Firmware as specified in Watson IoT Platform Device Model. The following attributes are present as part of the Device Firmware,
    • mgmt.firmware.version
    • mgmt.firmware.name
    • mgmt.firmware.url
    • mgmt.firmware.verifier
    • mgmt.firmware.state
    • mgmt.firmware.updateStatus
    • mgmt.firmware.updatedDateTime

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DeviceFirmware.Builder
      A Builder class that helps to build the Device Firmware object
      static class  DeviceFirmware.FirmwareState
      The firmware update process is separated into two distinct actions, Downloading Firmware, and Updating Firmware.
      static class  DeviceFirmware.FirmwareUpdateStatus
      The mgmt.firmware.updateStatus attribute describes the status of firmware update.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.ibm.wiotp.sdk.devicemgmt.resource.Resource

        Resource.ChangeListenerType
